name: getting-started-sample
description: Example extension contribution to Getting Started page

commands.title: Getting Started Sample: Say Hello
commands.shortTitle: Say Hello (This is the name used in the New File quick pick)

steps.title: Run Command
steps.description:
This step will run a command and check off once it has been run.
[Run Command](command:getting-started-sample.runCommand)

steps.title: Change Setting
steps.description:
This step will change a setting and check off when the setting has changed
[Change Setting](command:getting-started-sample.changeSetting)

steps.title: Set Context
steps.description:
This step will set a context key, and check off when that context has been set
[Set Context](command:getting-started-sample.setContext)

steps.title: Install Python Extension
steps.description:
Click here to install the Python Extension. This step will complete once it has been installed.
[Here](command:workbench.extensions.installExtension?%22ms-python.python%22)

steps.title: Open Terminal
steps.description: Click [here](command:workbench.action.terminal.toggleTerminal) to open terminal. This step will complete once the terminal has been opened.

steps.title: Use SVG's
steps.description: Try out using SVG's in your content, they can react to the theme (try: ``var(--vscode-foreground)``) and even host command links (try: ``xlink:href="command:``)

steps.title: UI Platform: Mac
steps.description: This step will only show on a Mac.

steps.title: UI Platform: Windows
steps.description: This step will only show on Windows

steps.title: UI Platform: Linux
steps.description: This step will only show on Linux

steps.title: Workspace Platform: Mac
steps.description: This step will only show on Mac remotes.

steps.title: Workspace Platform: Windows
steps.description: This step will only show on Windows remotes

steps.title: Workspace Platform: Linux
steps.description: This step will only show on Linux remotes

steps.title: Workspace Platform: Web
steps.description: This step will only show on webworker remotes

steps.title: View Sources
steps.description:
Open a folder containg the sources of this extension.
[View Sources](command:getting-started-sample.viewSources)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
